title: Tumbleweed Bikes Titanium Stargazers in Stock
content:
If youâ€™re looking for a dream machine, titanium drop bar mountain bike to tour on this year, Tumbleweed Bikes just got in a shipment of its lauded titanium Stargazer. These are the same as the steel Stargazer model we reviewed two years ago, just made from lightweight and flexy titanium tubing. Tumbleweed can either build one up as a complete, or sell you the frame.

Check out more at Tumbleweed Bikes!
